description.narrative: To collaborate with allies to analyze policy options in the post-election US political and economic climate and to identify two to three specific and achievable policy goals to address the food crisis and engage members in building food sovereignty. To enhance historical and cultural interchange and policy education at the grassroots level through events, interchanges and policy dialogue. To expand the leadership capacity of member organizations to further engage in the work of Via Campesina, the World Social Forum and other national and international venues. To produce educational materials, policy alerts and mobilization strategies to policy goals identified to address the food crisis and build food sovereignty
